verses.roman:
ācārya kahe,--tumi yei kaha, sei satya haya
sarva-śāstre vaiṣṇavera ei suniścaya

synonyms: ācārya kahe—the Tattvavādī ācārya said; tumi—You; yei—whatever; kaha—say; sei—that; satya—truth; haya—is; sarva-śāstre—in all revealed scriptures; vaiṣṇavera—of the devotees of Lord Viṣṇu; ei—this; su-niścaya—conclusion.
translation: The Tattvavādī ācārya replied, "What You have said is certainly factual. It is the conclusion of all the revealed scriptures of the Vaiṣṇavas.
